pdf.head:
<#if .locale == "zh_CN">
<#elseif .locale == "zh_TW">
<#elseif .locale == "ja_JP">
<#elseif .locale == "ko_KR">
<#elseif .locale == "th_TH">
</#if>
<#if record.subsidiary.internalid?string == '3'>
</#if>
<#if record.subsidiary.internalid?string == '10'>
</#if>
<#if record.subsidiary.internalid?string == '6'>
</#if> <#if record.subsidiary.internalid?string == '13'>
</#if> <#if record.subsidiary.internalid?string == '4'>
</#if> <#if record.subsidiary.internalid?string == '7'>
</#if>
<#if subsidiary.name?has_content> ${subsidiary.name}</#if>
<#if subsidiary.mainaddress_text?has_content>${subsidiary.mainaddress_text}</#if>
TRN : <#if subsidiary.federalidnumber?has_content>${subsidiary.federalidnumber}</#if>
<#if (record.status == "Pending Approval") >
PENDING FOR APPROVAL
</#if>
*This is a system-generated document. No signature is required.
( Page of )
pdf.body:
PAYMENT VOUCHER
Payment To
:
<#if record.entity.isperson?string == "T"> ${record.entity.firstname} ${record.entity.lastname} <#else> ${record.entity.companyname} </#if>
<#if record.entity.address?has_content>
Address
:
${record.entity.address}
</#if> <#if record.total?has_content>
Account
:
${record.account}
</#if>
<#if record.total?has_content>
Amount
:
${record.total?string["#,##0.00"]}
</#if>
<#if record.transactionnumber?has_content>
Transaction#
:
${record.transactionnumber}
</#if> <#if record.trandate?has_content>
Date
:
${record.trandate?string("dd-MMM-YYYY")}
</#if> <#if record.currencysymbol?has_content>
Currency
:
${record.currencysymbol}
</#if> <#if record.exchangerate?has_content>
Exchange Rate
:
${record.exchangerate?string["#,##0.00"]}
</#if>
<#if record.custbody_kpib_bank_account?has_content>
Bank Name
&nbs <#if record.custbody_kpib_payment_method?has_content>
Payment Mode
:
${record.custbody_kpib_payment_method}
</#if>p; :
${record.custbody_kpib_bank_account}
</#if> <#if record.custbody_kpib_cheque_number?has_content>
Check No
:
${record.custbody_kpib_cheque_number}
</#if> <#if record.custbody_kpib_cheque_date?has_content>
Check Date
:
${record.custbody_kpib_cheque_date}
</#if>
<#if record.memo?has_content>
Memo
:
${record.memo}
</#if>
<#if record.apply?has_content>
Apply
Type
Ref#
Date
Paid Amount
<#assign subtot=0/> <#list record.apply as apply>
<#if apply.apply?string == "Yes" >
${apply.type}
${apply.refnum}
${apply.applydate}
${apply.amount?string('##,#00.00')}
<#assign subtot=subtot + apply.amount/> </#if> </#list>
<#assign totalamt = record.unapplied + record.applied >
Total
${subtot?string('##,#00.00')}
Amount in Words : ${record.currencysymbol} ${record.custbody_total_amount_in_words}
</#if>
<#if subsidiary.internalid?string == '13'>
${record.custbody_nalg_created_by} <#if record.custbody_nalg_created_by.title?has_content>${record.custbody_nalg_created_by.title} <#else>
</#if>
____________
Created By
<#if record.custbody_kpi_first_approve_reject?has_content>${record.custbody_kpi_first_approve_reject} <#else>
</#if>
_______________
Checked by
<#if record.custbody_kpi_second_approve_reject?has_content>${record.custbody_kpi_second_approve_reject} <#else>
</#if>
_______________
Approved By
_______________
Received By
<#else>
___________________
${record.custbody_nalg_created_by}
Prepared By
___________________
Received By
</#if>
